name: Orlando's Javascript Playground
body:
### Welcome to Orlando's Javascript Playground.

I'm trying to learn HTML5, Javascript and CSS (I still have a problem joining them all together :). I will be doing a few tiny projects, that look more like programs, and I will post them here. Feel free to use anything you see (CC-BY-SA by default, but ask if you need something else).

My first project is [Tic Tac Toe](https://github.com/okaram/html-css-js/tree/master/TicTacToe)
tagline: Orlando is Playing with HTML, CSS and Javascript
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
